entities.name: st mungo's hospital for magical maladies and injuries
entities.description: The hospital is mentioned as the place where portraits of wizards are located.

entities.name: phineas
entities.description: Phineas is a wizard whose portrait is in St. Mungo's Hospital for Magical Maladies and Injuries.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the current Headmaster of Hogwarts.

entities.name: armando dippet
entities.description: Armando Dippet is Dumbledore's predecessor as Headmaster of Hogwarts.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is a wizard who knows not to destroy Phineas's portrait.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is the school where Dumbledore and Armando Dippet were Headmasters.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who recognizes Armando Dippet's portrait.

relationships.description: Armando Dippet was the predecessor of Dumbledore as Headmaster of Hogwarts.
Sirius knows not to destroy Phineas's portrait.
Dumbledore is the current Headmaster of Hogwarts.
